nodes.text: Wardport Landa was an outpost owned by House Alde in the Juran Mountains on Alderaan and affiliated to the Galactic Republic during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. Wardport Landa was commanded by Captain Alethios, while Captain Cahill, Commander Raikon and Major Corlis Brado Cressen were stationed there as well.
